name: Agnibha Dutta
bio: My name is Agnibha Dutta, cybersecurity trainer, mentor, and part-time bug-hunter. I am currently a Security Engineer and Chief Triager at Bugbase. Additionally, I am a cybersecurity instructor at Cybervie. I have hacked and secured more than 100 Fortune companies and been in the HackerOne leaderboard among the top 50 hackers in India. Interestingly, I am also an MBBS student.

name: Sanglap Mridha
bio: A passionate Software Engineer and community enthusiast. 2024 CSE graduate, currently working at Altor Smart Mobility (Shark Tank featured) as a Software Engineer. Previously led the GDSC chapter at FIEM.
